snippet: Mobile advertising is beginning to grow rapidly, but are marketers throwing their dollars away? Audience measurement and targeting is far more primitive with mobile apps than on the Web. Mobilewalla, a Seattle-based start-up, has an innovative...
abstract: Mobile advertising is beginning to grow rapidly, but are marketers throwing their dollars away? Audience measurement and targeting is far more primitive with mobile apps than on the Web. Mobilewalla, a Seattle-based start-up, has an innovative data-intensive approach to tackling the mobile ad challenge.

headline.main: A Big Data Weapon for the Mobile Ad Challenge
headline.print_headline: Mining the Value Of Mobile Ads
